Name: Halloween Escape
About the game: Halloween Escape is a high-score chasing thrill ride based upon staying alive while dodging pumpkins, flying skulls, and jellyfish. Use A or Left Arrow and D or Right Arrow to dodge obstacles and keep your lives for as long as possible. High-scores Pumpkins Survive During Halloween Flying Skulls Jellyfish
